lines.text: Yeah, if they had a knife and fork.
Why are the roaches killing people and how do we stop them?
[Dr. Hubbard has fallen in love with the man-eating roaches]
I so admire their ability to reproduce without the contribution of their male counterpart.
[Mayor Johnson tries to stem island-wide panic caused by the roaches' attacks]
I'm sorry but you're just going to have to trust me.
